info.title: Pickup
info.description: Using the Pickup API, applications can schedule pickups, manage previously scheduled pickups, or cancel previously scheduled pickups.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Pickup, Error Codes and Appendix

post.summary: Using the Pickup API, applications can schedule pickups, manage previously scheduled pickups, or cancel previously scheduled pickups.

parameters.name: AccessLicenseNumber
parameters.description:
Authorization: Access Key obtained 
through on-boarding process. 
Contact your UPS representative for 
additional information. Maximum Length:16

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

requestBody.description: Using the Pickup API, applications can schedule pickups, manage previously scheduled pickups, or cancel previously scheduled pickups.

xml.value:
<?xml version"1.0" encoding"UTF-8"?>
<env:Envelope xmlns:env"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" 
xmlns:xsd"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" 
xmlns:upss"http://www.ups.com/XMLSchema/XOLTWS/UPSS/v1.0" 
xmlns:wsf"http://www.ups.com/schema/wsf" 
xmlns:common"http://www.ups.com/XMLSchema/XOLTWS/Common /v1.0">
<env:Header>
<upss:UPSSecurity>
<upss:UsernameToken>
<upss:Username> Your Username</upss:Username>
<upss:Password> Your Password</upss:Password>
</upss:UsernameToken>
<upss:ServiceAccessToken>
<upss:AccessLicenseNumber>Your Access License Number</upss:AccessLicenseNumber>
</upss:ServiceAccessToken>
</upss:UPSSecurity>
</env:Header>
<env:Body>
<XOLTWS:PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest 
xmlns:XOLTWS"http://www.ups.com/XMLSchema/XOLTWS/Pickup /v1.1" 
xmlns:xsi"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
<common:Request>
<common:TransactionReference>
<common:TransactionIdentifier>WSCM10098639041216153622SP0001B96F355</commo
n:TransactionIdentifier>
</common:TransactionReference>
</common:Request>
<XOLTWS:PickupPiece>
<XOLTWS:ServiceCode>ServiceCode</XOLTWS:ServiceCode>
<XOLTWS:ContainerCode>03</XOLTWS:ContainerCode>
</XOLTWS:PickupPiece>
<XOLTWS:DestinationAddress>
<XOLTWS:City>City</XOLTWS:City>
<XOLTWS:StateProvince>StateProvince</XOLTWS:StateProvince>
<XOLTWS:PostalCode>PostalCode</XOLTWS:PostalCode>
<XOLTWS:CountryCode>US</XOLTWS:CountryCode>
</XOLTWS:DestinationAddress>
<XOLTWS:ProximitySearchIndicator/>
<XOLTWS:Locale>en_HK</XOLTWS:Locale>
</XOLTWS:PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest>
</env:Body>
</env:Envelope>

Locale.description:
Origin Country or Territory Locale.  Locale should be Origin Country. Example: en_US. 
The Last 50 instruction will be send based on this locale. Locale is required if PoximityIndicator is present for Drop Off facilities.

ProximitySearchIndicator.description: Proximity Indicator.  Indicates the user requested the proximity search for UPS Worldwide Express Freight and UPS Worldwide Express Freight Midday locations for the origin address and/or the airport code, and the sort code for destination address.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest.description: This request is to retrieve UPS Facility location information including location address, phone number, SLIC, and hours of operation for pick-up and drop-off requests

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

TransactionReference_CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

ServiceCode.description:
The service code.
96  WWEF  Required for WWEF shipments.

ContainerCode.description:
The container type
03  PALLET  Required for WWEF shipments.

PickupPiece_ServiceCode.description:
The service code.
96  WWEF  Required for WWEF shipments.

PickupPiece_ContainerCode.description:
The container type
03  PALLET  Required for WWEF shipments.

StreetAddress.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

City.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

StateProvince.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory is US/CA/IE/HK.

PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory has postal code.It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK.

CountryCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest_.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required for drop off location search.

OriginAddress_StreetAddress.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

OriginAddress_City.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present.

OriginAddress_StateProvince.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search.  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory is US/CA/IE/HK.

OriginAddress_PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search  Conditionally required if proximitySearchIndicator is present and if country or territory has postal code.It does not apply to non-postal countries such as IE and HK.

OriginAddress_CountryCode.description: Indicates the address of the shipper to allow for the nearest Drop off facility Search

SearchRadius.description:
Search Request range.
Valied values: 1 to 200
Default: 200

DistanceUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of Measure  Required if ProximitySearchIndicator is present. Example: MI or KM

MaximumLocation.description:
Maximum Number of locations.
Valied values: 1 to 100
Default: 100

OriginAddress_OriginSearchCriteria.description: Origin Search Criteria Container  Required if Proximity SearchIndicator is present.

OriginSearchCriteria_SearchRadius.description:
Search Request range.
Valied values: 1 to 200
Default: 200

OriginSearchCriteria_DistanceUnitOfMeasu.description: Unit of Measure  Required if ProximitySearchIndicator is present. Example: MI or KM

OriginSearchCriteria_MaximumLocation.description:
Maximum Number of locations.
Valied values: 1 to 100
Default: 100

City.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.  Required for non-postal country Ireland (IE).

StateProvince.description:
Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.
1  District code for Hong Kong (HK)
2  County for Ireland (IE)
3  State or province for all the postal countries  Required for non-postal countries including HK and IE.

PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search  It does not apply to non-postal countries. Example: IE and HK.

CountryCode.description: The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. Please check check separate pickup country or territory list to find out all the pickup eligible countries.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest_.description: DestinationAddress container.  Conditionally required for pickup location search.

DestinationAddress_City.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.  Required for non-postal country Ireland (IE).

DestinationAddress_StateProvince.description:
Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search.
1  District code for Hong Kong (HK)
2  County for Ireland (IE)
3  State or province for all the postal countries  Required for non-postal countries including HK and IE.

DestinationAddress_PostalCode.description: Indicates the address of the consignee to allow for the nearest Pickup facility Search  It does not apply to non-postal countries. Example: IE and HK.

DestinationAddress_CountryCode.description: The pickup country or territory code as defined by ISO-3166. Please check check separate pickup country or territory list to find out all the pickup eligible countries.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesRequest_.description:
Origin Country or Territory Locale.  Locale should be Origin Country. Example: en_US. 
The Last 50 instruction will be send based on this locale. Locale is required if PoximityIndicator is present for Drop Off facilities.

Proximity Indicator.  Indicates the user requested the proximity search for UPS Worldwide Express Freight and UPS Worldwide Express Freight Midday locations for the origin address and/or the airport code, and the sort code for destination address.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesResponse.description: Returns service center location information for Origin UPS Facilities and Destination Facilities

Code.description:
Identifies the success of the transaction. 
1Success
0failed

ResponseStatus_Code.description:
Identifies the success of the transaction. 
1Success
0failed

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext information that is echoed back during response.

PickupGetServiceCenterFacilitiesResponse.description: Locations of the nearest Service Center for Dropoff and Pickup

SLIC.description: SLIC code for the UPS Drop off facility.

Type.description: FRT for Freight or PKG for Package

Timezone.description:
Facilitys Timezone
Format:
America/New_York
Asia/Hong_Kong
Europe/London

Phone.description: Phone Number of the Drop off Facility

ServiceCenterLocation_DropOffFacilities.description: Returns information for DropOff Facilities. This includes name of facility, address, business hours, and SLIC.

CountryCode.description: UPS Pickup facility country or territory code.

ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is a residential place or not. 
Valid Values:
Y  Residential address
N  Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

Address_CountryCode.description: UPS Pickup facility country or territory code.

Address_ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is a residential place or not. 
Valid Values:
Y  Residential address
N  Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

DropOffFacilities_SLIC.description: SLIC code for the UPS Drop off facility.

DropOffFacilities_Type.description: FRT for Freight or PKG for Package

DropOffFacilities_Timezone.description:
Facilitys Timezone
Format:
America/New_York
Asia/Hong_Kong
Europe/London

DropOffFacilities_Phone.description: Phone Number of the Drop off Facility

EarliestDropOfforPickup.description: Earliest time that a customer can pick up a package.

LatestDropOfforPickup.description: Latest time that a customer can pick up a package.

OpenHours.description:
Facility Open Hours. The latest local open time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

CloseHours.description:
Facility Close Hours. The latest local close time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

PrepTime.description: Preparation time for hold for pickup  Conditionally required if request is for hold for pickup.

LastDrop.description: Latest time a package, requiring preparation can be dropped off (Close time - Prep time).

DayOfWeek_EarliestDropOfforPickup.description: Earliest time that a customer can pick up a package.

DayOfWeek_LatestDropOfforPickup.description: Latest time that a customer can pick up a package.

DayOfWeek_OpenHours.description:
Facility Open Hours. The latest local open time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

DayOfWeek_CloseHours.description:
Facility Close Hours. The latest local close time.
Format: HHmm
Hour: 0-23
Minute: 0-59

DayOfWeek_PrepTime.description: Preparation time for hold for pickup  Conditionally required if request is for hold for pickup.

DayOfWeek_LastDrop.description: Latest time a package, requiring preparation can be dropped off (Close time - Prep time).

Last50ftInstruction.description:
Last 50ft instructions that relates to an available facility and depend on the locale passing in request.
Last 50 feet instruction in the language asked in request or the English for that country.

DropOffFacilities_LocalizedInstruction.description: Localized Instruction Container.  Localized Instructions will be returned for drop off location search by proximity order.

LocalizedInstruction_Last50ftInstruction.description:
Last 50ft instructions that relates to an available facility and depend on the locale passing in request.
Last 50 feet instruction in the language asked in request or the English for that country.

Value.description:
Distance from origin address. Distance based on distance UOM in request.
Numeric value up to 200 and .2 decimal positions  Distance will be retuned fordrop off location search by proximity order.

UnitOfMeasurement.description:
Unit Of Measure.
Example: MI or KM

DropOffFacilities_Distance.description: Distance from origin  Distance will be retuned fordrop off location search by proximity order.

Distance_Value.description:
Distance from origin address. Distance based on distance UOM in request.
Numeric value up to 200 and .2 decimal positions  Distance will be retuned fordrop off location search by proximity order.

Distance_UnitOfMeasurement.description:
Unit Of Measure.
Example: MI or KM

SLIC.description: SLIC code for the UPS Pickup facility

Timezone.description:
Facilitys Timezone.
Format:
America/New_York
Asia/Hong_Kong
Europe/London

Phone.description: Phone Number of the Pickup Facility

AirportCode.description:
AirPort Code for destination/pickup facility. 
Example: ATL (Atlanta)
If Airport code is not present "---" will be returned.

SortCode.description:
Sort Code for destination/pickup facility. 
Example: V1

ServiceCenterLocation_PickupFacilities.description: Returns information for Pickup Facilities. This includes name of facility, address, and business hours.

CountryCode.description: UPS Pickup facility country or territory code.

ResidentialIndicator.description:
Indicates if the pickup address is a residential place or not. 
Valid Values:
Y  Residential address
N  Non-residential (Commercial) address (default)

PickupFacilities_SLIC.description: SLIC code for the UPS Pickup facility

PickupFacilities_Timezone.description:
Facilitys Timezone.
Format:
America/New_York
Asia/Hong_Kong
Europe/London

PickupFacilities_Phone.description: Phone Number of the Pickup Facility

PickupFacilities_AirportCode.description:
AirPort Code for destination/pickup facility. 
Example: ATL (Atlanta)
If Airport code is not present "---" will be returned.

PickupFacilities_SortCode.description:
Sort Code for destination/pickup facility. 
Example: V1
